WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 24 February 2024
Condition of Rain:
Showers  or  thundershowers  may  occur  at  a  few  places  in  the  sea  areas  extending  from
Puttalam to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle in the evening or night.
Winds:
Wind will be variable and wind speed will be (15-25) kmph in the sea areas around the island.
Wind speed may increase up to (40-45) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Matara to Hambantota and from Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar.
State of Sea:
Sea areas around the island will be Slight.
The  sea  areas  off  the  coasts  extending  from  Matara  to  Hambantota  and  from  Puttalam  to
Kankasanthurai via Mannar can be fairly rough at times.
